name: timely
title: Timely
description: List and create Timely projects from Raycast.
author: Dohm

commands.name: timely
commands.title: Search Projects
commands.description: Search Timely projects and open or copy them

preferences.name: clientId
preferences.title: Client ID
preferences.description: From your Timely OAuth app (Settings > OAuth Applications)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
